comment: Battle Factory challenge 1 only
The worst of the worst - this tier mostly is mons with BST <= 270
Avoid moves with power above 60 since they can break this tier
Damage-boosting items probably should not appear yet

pokemon.comment: Fully-invested base 20 huge power is equivalent to fully-invested base 90
Fully-invested base 20 huge power is equivalent to fully-invested base 90

comment: BST puts this in the next tier, but moves make it belong here
Battle factory challenges 1+2
This tier is mostly pokemon with BST 270-300
Avoid moves with power above 60 still
Battle factory challenges 1+2+3
This tier is principally pokemon with BST 300-330
Avoid STAB moves with power above 70

pokemon.comment: Light Ball makes this quite strong, probably move up a tier

comment: Consider not using Thick Club, or moving down a tier
BST is 345 which puts this a tier up, but only because of massive SpD
Battle factory challenges 2+3+4
This tier is principally pokemon with BST 330-360
Avoid STAB moves with power above 70
BST puts this in previous tier, but that's because of the minimal speed
BST puts this in previous tier, but that's because of the minimal speed
Thick Club may merit moving this up a tier
especially since median stat is quite good due to minimal speed
Battle factory challenges 3+4+5
This tier is principally pokemon with BST 360-390
EVs look odd but if you get the herbed Nasty Plot
Sp. Attack should probably be quite high for a sweep?
Battle factory challenges 4+5+6
This tier is principally pokemon with BST 390-420

pokemon.comment: Low speed but everything else is above average for this tier - consider moving

comment: Battle factory challenges 10+11+12

This tier is principally pokemon with BST 570-600
Battle factory challenge 12+13+14
Now things get a little more interesting: anything goes with movesets,
hidden abilities, etc.
Use fully evolved mons (or Eviolite) on Pokemon with BSTs up to 480
No tutor abilities yet

pokemon.comment: 80 speed EVs should outspeed fully-invested 120 base in sandstorm
Consider a lens item if compound eyes isn't good enough

todo.comment: Eviolite togetic maybe? If so it goes after Sudowoodo
